name: ResuscitativeEndovascularBalloonOcclusionOfTheAortaREBOA
title: Resuscitative Endovascular Balloon Occlusion of the Aorta (REBOA)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this ICD-10-PCS value set is to represent concepts for insertion of intra-aortic balloon pump procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent Resuscitative Endovascular Balloon Occlusion of the Aorta (REBOA) procedures),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
